# Color

export const colors = {
  primary: '#5858FF',
  primarLight: '#F6F6FF',
  black: '#212121',
  grantie: '#666666',
  stone: '#999999',
  fog: '#BDBDBD', // usually used to display disbaled state
  grey: '#EEEEEE',
  ice: '#F9F9F9',
  white: '#FFFFFF',
  transparent: 'transparent',
  green: '#108043',
  lightGreen: '#EEFFEA',
  blue: '#1E90FF',
  lightBlue: '#E4F2FF',
  red: '#F52209',
  lightRed: '#FEE4E1',
  yellow: '#CF8909',
  lightYellow: '#FFF9ED',
  mask: '#0000007f',
}

export const Component = () => {
  return (
    <div style={{display: "flex", flexDirect: "row", flexWrap: "wrap"}}>
      {Object.keys(colors).map(item => {
        return (
          <div style={{display: "flex", flexDirection: "column", alignItems: "center"}}>
            <div 
              style={{
                backgroundColor: colors[item],
                width: "100px",
                height: "100px",
                margin: "10px",
              }}
            />
            <div>{item}</div>
          </div>
        )
      })}
    </div>
  )
}

<Component />
